name: A Robin's Flight
description:
A young woman's past has caused her to bring together a group of outlaws and misfits: Fera the bandit, Mara the slavegirl, Ugnor the mage, Whispers the thief and Elamir the mercenary. With sword and shield they rob the caravans leaving for the port cities and with cloak and dagger they plot the downfall of the province's rulers.
Is the ancient weapon she is looking for a blessing or a curse?
What is she willing to do to achieve her goals?​
